隰字的基本解释

隰
xí
低湿的地方：“山有榛，隰有苓”。
新开垦的田。

隰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
［《廣韻》似入切，入緝，邪。］
(1)低湿的地方。
(2)新垦的田地。
(3)春秋齐邑名，即犁丘。在今山东省临邑县西。
(4)古州名。在今山西省隰县。春秋晋称蒲邑，汉为蒲子县，隋为隰州。
(5)姓。春秋时齐有大夫隰朋。见《左传·僖公九年》。
[②]［xiè］
［《集韻》悉協切，入帖，心。］
同“濕4”。
人名用字。

隰字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隰； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1362第12
〔古文〕?【唐韻】似入切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】席入切，?音習。【爾雅·釋地】下濕曰隰。【說文】阪下濕也。【釋名】隰，蟄也。蟄，濕意也。【書·禹貢】原隰底績。【詩·邶風】山有榛，隰有苓。【公羊傳·昭元年】下平曰隰。　又【詩·周頌】徂隰徂畛。【箋】隰謂新發田也。【疏】隰，指地形而言，則是未嘗墾發，故知謂新發田也。　又【左傳·桓三年】逐翼侯于汾隰。【註】汾隰，汾水邊也。【後漢·西羌傳】昔晉侯敗北戎于汾、隰。【註】二水名。○按汾隰，當從左傳註。　又地名。【左傳·隱十一年】王與鄭人隰郕。【註】在懷縣西南。【前漢·地理志】西河郡隰成。又【左傳·文十六年】先君蚡冒，所以服陘隰也。【註】陘隰，地名。　又【廣韻】州名。左傳曰：重耳居蒲，卽隰川州，故蒲城是也。漢爲蒲子縣後，魏齊周之閒爲沁州。隋爲隰州，以州前有泉下濕，蓋取下濕之義名之也。又姓。【左傳·僖九年】齊隰朋帥師會秦師，納晉惠公。　又【集韻】悉協切，音燮。人名。春秋傳有公子隰。○按春秋襄八年，鄭人侵蔡，獲蔡

隰字的起名意思

低湿之地；〈古〉指新开发的田地。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
xí
Low-humidity places: "There are hazels in the mountains, and Lings in the mountains".
Newly cultivated fields.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
["Guangyun" seems to be cut, entertaining, and evil. ]
(1) A place with low humidity.
(2) Newly cultivated fields.
(3) The name of Qiyi in the Spring and Autumn Period, that is, Liqiu. In the west of Linyi County, Shandong Province.
(4) The name of the ancient state. In today's Xi County, Shanxi Province. It was called Puyi in the Spring and Autumn Period, Puzi County in the Han Dynasty, and Xizhou in the Sui Dynasty.
(5) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, there were doctors Xi Peng. See "Zuo Zhuan·Xi Gong Nine Years".
[②]［xiè］
["Ji Yun" Xixie cut, enter the post, heart. ]
Same as "Wet 4".
Use characters for names.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　隰; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1362 No. 12
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] seems to cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Xi cuts into it, and learns the sound. 【Erya·Shidi】Xia wet and said Xi. [Said the text] Sakashita is also wet. [Release name] Xi, sting. Sting, wet. 【Book·Yugong】Yuan Xi's record. [Poetry·Bei Feng] There are hazels in the mountains, and Lings in Xi. 【The Story of Gongyang·Zhaoyuan】Xiaping said Xi.　[Poem·Zhou Song] 徂隰徂畛. [Jan] Xi said that Xinfa Tianya. 【Sparse】Xian refers to the terrain, but it has not been cultivated, so it is known as Xinfatian.　[Zuo Zhuan·Huan Three Years] Fighting Wings Hou Yufenxun. [Note] Fenxi, also by Fenshui. [Later Han·Xi Qiang Biography] Xi Jin Hou defeated Bei Rong Yufen and Xi. [Note] Ershui name. ○Press Fenxi, when the bet is passed from the left.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleventh Years] Wang and Zheng Renxi. [Note] In the southwest of Huai County. [Former Han·Geography] Xihe County, Xicheng. Also [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Sixteenth Year] Xianjun had a brat, so he served Xingxie. [Note] Xingxie, place name.　[Guangyun] State name. Zuo Zhuan said: Chong'er is in Pu, and Xi'an is in Chuanzhou, so Pucheng is also. After the Han Dynasty became Puzi County, the rest of Wei, Qi and Zhou's period was Qinzhou. The Sui Dynasty was Xizhou, and it was named after the springs in front of the state were wet, and the wetness was removed from the cover. Another surname. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Nine Years] Qi Xiupeng, the handsome teacher, met with the Qin teacher and accepted Jin Huigong.　[Jiyun] Xixieqie, Yinxie. Person's name. There is a son Xi in the Spring and Autumn Period. ○According to the eighth year of the Spring and Autumn Period, Zheng people invaded Cai and won Cai

xí
xí
I сущ.
1) низкая (заболоченная, сырая) местность; топь
2) поднятая целина; новь
II собств.
ист. геогр. Си (селение а) на террит. нынешней пров. Хэнань, дин. Чжоу; б) на террит. нынешней пров. Шаньдун, эпоха Чуньцю)
